## Events.ThemeChange.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `ThemeChange` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(opt_themeName?: string, opt_workspaceId?: string);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_themeName | string | _(Optional)_ The theme name. Undefined for a blank event. |
|  opt\_workspaceId | string | _(Optional)_ The workspace identifier for this event. event. Undefined for a blank event. |
